experience: You and Eric both know Tom O'Neill, Jerami Tainter, and 9 others
Excited to start my new adventure at Daugherty Business Solutions tomorrow!

Our engineers, architects and analysts help clients get results faster with a “whole team” pragmatic point of view about how Agile and DevOps work together. We’re a curious lot, always interested in hands-on learning of new tools, technologies and methods, not just for fun but also so that we can help our clients get past the hype and move on to reality. Here in the Twin Cities, our specialties are delivery of custom Java, .Net and Mobile solutions.

I manage the JVM software development team. I also work on strategic initiatives that shape the workflow of the Development Department at The Nerdery. My team's capabilities include Java/Spring, Scala, Big Data/Data Science, Groovy, Android, etc.
IT professional consulting and direct hire.Business Development and recruiting for contract and permanent IT positions, primarily in the Twin Cities.
